trans-unit.source: A data bound list control that displays items using templates.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結清單控制項，使用範本顯示項目。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Templates](#templates) - [Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [Display Direction and Layout](#display_direction_and_layout) - [Security](#security) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction Use the DataList control to display a template-defined data bound list.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [範本](#templates) - [自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀](#customizing_the_appearance_of_the_datalist_control) - [顯示方向和配置](#display_direction_and_layout) - [安全性](#security) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介使用 DataList 控制項來顯示範本定義的資料繫結的清單。

trans-unit.source: The DataList control supports selecting and editing.
trans-unit.target: DataList 控制項支援選取和編輯。

trans-unit.source: ## Templates The contents of the DataList control can be manipulated by using templates.
trans-unit.target: # # 範本 DataList 控制項的內容可使用範本的操作。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the supported templates.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出支援的範本。

trans-unit.source: |Template Name|Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for alternating items in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: |範本名稱 |描述 | |-------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>|如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中 DataList 替代項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the item currently being edited in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，`ItemTemplate`使用。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>|如果定義，提供內容和配置項目的目前正在編輯中 DataList。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, `ItemTemplate` is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the footer section of the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義，`ItemTemplate`使用。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>|如果定義，提供內容和配置 DataList 的頁尾區段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a footer section will not be displayed.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the header section of the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，將不會顯示頁尾區段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>|如果定義，提供內容和配置 DataList 的標頭區段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a header section will not be displayed.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>|Required template that provides the content and layout for items in the DataList.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the currently selected item in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，將不會顯示標頭區段。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>|所需的範本中 DataList 項目提供的內容和配置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A>|如果定義，提供內容和配置 DataList 中目前選取的項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A>|If defined, provides the content and layout for the separator between items in the DataList.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A>|如果定義，提供內容和版面配置中 DataList 項目之間的分隔符號。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If not defined, a separator will not be displayed.| At the very minimum, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A> needs to be defined to display the items in the DataList control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定義時，將不會顯示為分隔符號。 | 在最起碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>需要 DataList 控制項中顯示的項目定義。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additional templates can be used to provide a custom look to the DataList control.
trans-unit.target: 其他範本可以用來提供自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: ## Customizing the Appearance of the DataList Control The appearance of the DataList control may be customized by setting the style properties for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: # # 自訂可能會藉由設定控制項的不同部分的樣式屬性自訂 DataList 控制項的外觀 DataList 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Style Property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for alternating items in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the item being edited in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the footer in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the header in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the items in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the selected item in the DataList control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the separator between the items in the DataList control.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: |樣式屬性 |描述 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>|指定替代 DataList 控制項中的項目樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>|指定正在編輯 DataList 控制項中項目的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A>|DataList 控制項中指定頁尾的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>|DataList 控制項中指定的標頭的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>|DataList 控制項中指定之項目的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>|DataList 控制項中指定的選取項目的樣式。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A>|指定 DataList 控制項中的項目之間的分隔符號的樣式。 | 您也可以顯示或隱藏的控制項的不同部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可控制哪些部分要顯示或隱藏的屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||Shows or hides the footer section of the DataList control.| ||Shows or hides the header section of the DataList control.| ## Display Direction and Layout The display direction of a DataList control can be vertical or horizontal.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| ||顯示或隱藏 DataList 控制項的頁尾區段。 | ||顯示或隱藏 DataList 控制項的標頭區段。 | # # 顯示方向和配置 DataList 控制項的顯示方向可以是垂直或水平。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property to specify the display direction.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性，以指定的顯示方向。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The layout of the DataList control is controlled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DataList 控制項的配置控制與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatLayout.Table` will display the DataList in a table format, while `RepeatLayout.Flow` displays the DataList without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`會以資料表格式，顯示在 DataList 時`RepeatLayout.Flow`會顯示在 DataList 不資料表結構。

trans-unit.source: ## Security The `DataList` control can contain controls that enable users to enter information.
trans-unit.target: # # 安全性`DataList`控制項可以包含控制項，可讓使用者輸入資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                              ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法```                                                                                                                                                                                              ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 替代項目中的取得的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AlternatingItemStyle 屬性來提供的自訂樣式中的交替項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the AlternatingItemStyle property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型 AlternatingItemStyle 屬性，覆寫紅色字型中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|AlternatingItemStyle| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: |優先順序 |樣式屬性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |AlternatingItemStyle | |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定自訂樣式替代項目，加上`<AlternatingItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<AlternatingItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<AlternatingItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that represents the style properties for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>中的項目物件，表示替代的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定替代中的項目範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the AlternatingItemTemplate property to control the contents of alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AlternatingItemTemplate 屬性來控制內容的替代項目中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of alternating items is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 外觀的替代項目由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the alternating items, place the `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定替代項目範本，加上`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<AlternatingItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<AlternatingItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for alternating items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>物件，其中包含 替代範本中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref>按鈕中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The CancelCommand event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelCommand 引發時`Cancel`按鈕中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the CancelCommand event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: CancelCommand 事件集的一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`（若要取消選取的項目） 並再重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 文字不是 HTML 編碼之前它會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您可以在文字中嵌入 HTML 標記中的指令碼。

trans-unit.source: If the values for the control come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項的值是來自使用者輸入，請務必驗證的值，以減少安全性弱點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the data list control, with or without the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 建立用來呈現資料清單控制項，使用或不指定的資料來源在控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlHierarchy method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom implementation from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 衍生的自訂實作，從主要由控制項開發人員使用 CreateControlHierarchy 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlHierarchy method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> methods to create <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls that represent the header, footer, separator, and data-bound items contained in the data list.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlHierarchy 方法會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>控制項代表頁首、 頁尾、 分隔符號及 [資料] 清單中包含的資料繫結項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CreateItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the data-bound items for the data list through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取透過資料清單的資料繫結項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access all item types, including the header, footer, and separator items, through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取所有項目類型，包括標頭、 頁尾及分隔符號項目，透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override the CreateControlHierarchy method to customize how <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> controls are created or added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 CreateControlHierarchy 方法，以自訂方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>建立或加入至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.InitializeItem%2A> method to customize templates for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> control.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the control's data source; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the control is being recreated from view state and should not be data-bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用控制項的資料來源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ，表示控制項會重新建立從檢視狀態，而且不能繫結的資料。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method is used primarily by control developers in deriving a custom implementation from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.ItemType%2A> properties are initialized for the new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> using the specified values, but the item is not inserted into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.

trans-unit.source: To unselect an item, set the EditItemIndex property to `-1`.

trans-unit.target: 選取的項目中的索引編號<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>来編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 選取的值是小於<xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性中進行編輯選取的項目的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemStyle property to provide a custom style for the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EditItemStyle 屬性來提供的自訂樣式中進行編輯選取的項目的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|EditItemStyle| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: |優先順序 |樣式屬性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |EditItemStyle | |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定自訂樣式選取要編輯的項目，加上`<EditItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<EditItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<EditItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties for the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>物件，其中包含中進行編輯選取的項目之樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中進行編輯選取的項目範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditItemTemplate property to control the contents of the item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EditItemTemplate 屬性來控制內容中進行編輯選取之項目的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the item selected for editing is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 編輯由選取之項目的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the item selected for editing, place the `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的範本進行編輯選取的項目，加上`<EditItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EditItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EditItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for the item selected for editing in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>物件，其中包含的範本中進行編輯選取的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the rows of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control, defined in each template of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control, are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否的資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>定義的每個範本中的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制，來擷取和顯示。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are specified by using templates.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項由使用範本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Normally, you list controls that you want to display in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您會列出您想要顯示範本中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can also place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template and display the rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制在範本中，並顯示資料表的資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: Use the ExtractTemplateRows property to specify whether the rows of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control defined in each template of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are extracted and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ExtractTemplateRows 屬性來指定是否的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項中的每個範本定義<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項就會擷取並顯示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: All rows extracted from the templates of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a single table.
trans-unit.target: 從範本擷取的所有資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制會顯示在單一資料表。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a single table from other smaller tables and still maintain the features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您從其他較小的資料表建立單一資料表又仍可維持的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When this property is set to `true`, you must provide a well-formed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for each template you want to include in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 當這個屬性設定為`true`，您必須提供語式正確<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項對於您想要包含在每個範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: Only the rows of the tables will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 將顯示的資料表的資料列。

trans-unit.source: All other content in the template will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在範本中的所有其他內容將被忽略。

trans-unit.source: You must use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control for this feature to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 您必須使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制這項功能才能正常運作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=fullName> control is not compatible with this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=fullName>控制項不是這個屬性與相容。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you create a cell for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control in a template, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object to control the number of columns the cell spans.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>控制項在範本中，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件來控制資料格所跨越的資料行數目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.ColumnSpan%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A> property to control the number of rows the cell spans.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A>屬性，即可控制的資料格所跨越的資料列數目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.RowSpan%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> properties do not affect the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control when this property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性不會影響的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制當這個屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the rows of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> control, defined in each template of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control, are extracted and displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料列的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref>定義的每個範本中的控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項，會擷取並顯示; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性的頁尾區段<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您藉由設定單一樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ShowFooter%2A> property must be set to `true` for this property to be visible.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control inherits the style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項繼承的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您藉由設定單一樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定覆寫繼承的樣式設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the footer section, place the `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定頁尾區段的範本，將`<FooterTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<FooterTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the grid line style for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|No grid lines.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|Displays the horizontal grid lines.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|Displays the vertical grid line.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|Displays both the horizontal and vertical grid lines.| > [!NOTE] > This property only applies if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`.
trans-unit.target: |樣式 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|任何格線。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|顯示水平格線。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|顯示垂直格線。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>|顯示水平及垂直格線行。 | > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性僅適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to programmatically control the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Items 集合以程式設計方式控制中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The Items collection does not provide any methods to add or remove items to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 項目集合不提供任何方法來新增或移除集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: However, you can control the contents of an item by providing a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以控制的項目內容所提供的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemCreated>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only items bound to the data source are contained in the Items collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 只有繫結至資料來源的項目集合中所包含的項目。

trans-unit.source: The header, footer, and separator are not included in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 頁首、 頁尾及分隔符號不會包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> objects representing the individual items within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItemCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref>代表個別的項目內的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性的項目提供的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the ItemStyle property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您指定以紅色字型 ItemStyle 屬性時，所有其他項目設定樣式中的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the ItemStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫 ItemStyle 屬性中指定的紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|ItemStyle| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, place the `<ItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: |優先順序 |樣式屬性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>| |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; |ItemStyle | |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定自訂的項目樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制、 放置`<ItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<ItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<ItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性提供替代不同的外觀中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties for the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>物件，其中包含中的項目之樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的項目範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemTemplate property to control the contents of the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ItemTemplate 屬性來控制內容中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的項目外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control, place the `<ItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的項目範本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制、 放置`<ItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<ItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<ItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A> property to provide a different appearance for the alternating items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇性地使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>屬性提供替代不同的外觀中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含的範本中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的檢視狀態的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法還原檢視狀態資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項所儲存的先前頁面要求從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，代表狀態的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the event for the server control is passed up the page's UI server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要將伺服器控制項的事件傳遞設定頁面的 UI 伺服器控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件已取消。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Use the OnCancelCommand method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的自訂處理常式 OnCancelCommand 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event is raised when the `Cancel` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>就會引發事件時`Cancel`按鈕中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item) and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>事件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`（若要取消選取的項目） 並再重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnCancelCommand method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnCancelCommand 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListCommandEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供該事件的自訂處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Use the OnDeleteCommand method to provide a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的自訂處理常式 OnDeleteCommand 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event is raised when the `Delete` button is clicked for an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>就會引發事件時`Delete`按鈕中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand> event removes the selected item from the data source and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>事件從資料來源中移除選取的項目，然後重新繫結至資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.DeleteCommand>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditCommand"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.
