trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的資料行數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the number of columns that display items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定顯示項目中的資料行數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set this property to `5`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control displays its items in five columns.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將此屬性設定為`5`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項五個資料行中顯示它的項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If this property is set to `0`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control displays its items in a single row or column, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這個屬性設定為`0`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項會顯示它的項目中的單一資料列或資料行，根據值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items are displayed in a single row.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，項目會顯示在單一資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A> property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items are displayed in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，項目會顯示在單一資料行。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中顯示的資料行數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control are displayed in a single row or column, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection*> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>，這表示中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制會顯示在單一資料列或資料行中，根據值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatDirection*>

trans-unit.source: The specified number of columns is a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料行數是負值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control displays vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項會顯示水平或垂直。

trans-unit.source: Use the RepeatDirection property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的顯示方向 Flow 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The number of columns displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 顯示的資料行的數目一律由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`, the items in the list are displayed in columns loaded from top to bottom, then left to right, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`，清單中的項目會顯示從上到下，載入的資料行中，然後由左至右，直到所有的項目會呈現。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性設定為`3`中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制會顯示在三個資料行，如下列表格所示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| |1|4|7| |2|5|8| |3|6|9| If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal`, the items in the list are displayed in rows loaded from left to right, then top to bottom, until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| |&1; |&4; |&7; | |&2; |&5; |&8; | |&3; |&6; |&9; | 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`，清單中的項目會顯示在資料列載入從左到右，然後排名最前面的底部，直到所有的項目會呈現。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性設定為`3`的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>在下表中的三個項目每個，資料列中顯示控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.RepeatColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Vertical" name="Vertical" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the control is displayed in a table or flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項是否會顯示在資料表或流程配置。

trans-unit.source: Use the RepeatLayout property to specify whether the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RepeatLayout 屬性來指定是否在項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項顯示資料表中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> values that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>值由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>的支援</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Table`, the items in the list are displayed in a table.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Table`，清單中的項目會顯示在資料表中。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatLayout.Flow`, the items in the list are displayed without a table structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatLayout.Flow`，清單中的項目會顯示不含資料表結構。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is displayed in a table, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A> property to specify a grid line style.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項顯示資料表中，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A>屬性來指定格線的線條樣式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.GridLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the control is displayed in a table or in flow layout.
trans-unit.target: 指定流程版面配置或資料表中是否顯示控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the supported <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個支援<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to the control view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存變更至控制項檢視狀態自頁面回傳至伺服器的時間。

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性，這是執行個體的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性的值然後之後儲存狀態伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段保存到字串物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element.
trans-unit.target: 儲存檢視狀態時，這個字串物件會傳回至用戶端為儲存在隱藏的 HTML input 項目中的變數。

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the SaveViewState method and modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property for your server control.
trans-unit.target: 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以改善效率 SaveViewState 方法覆寫並修改<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>伺服器控制項屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> view state.
trans-unit.target: 物件，其中包含所做的變更<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Select" name="Select" href=""></xref> command name.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_Select" name="Select" href=""></xref>命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectCommandName field to represent the `Select` command name.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectCommandName 欄位來代表`Select`命令名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取的項目中的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedIndex property to programmatically specify the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式指定在選取的項目使用 SelectedIndex 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to determine the index of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性決定選取之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SelectedIndex property is zero based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SelectedIndex 屬性是以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: To deselect an item, set the SelectedIndex property to `-1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消選取項目，請將 SelectedIndex 屬性設定為`-1`。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndex property is stored in control state.
trans-unit.target: SelectedIndex 屬性會儲存在控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: The index of the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在選取之項目的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值是小於<xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取的項目中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItem property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem> object that represents the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedItem 屬性來取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>物件，表示選取的項目中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem>

trans-unit.source: This object can then be used to access the properties of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 此物件可用來存取選取的項目屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"></xref> that represents the item selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem"> </xref>表示中所選取的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取的項目中的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide a custom style for the selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來針對選取的項目中提供的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control are inherited from one item style property to another through a hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項之間透過階層繼承自一個項目樣式屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Item style properties set lower in the hierarchy are inherited by item style properties higher in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層中較高的項目樣式屬性的繼承階層中設定較低的項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a red font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property, all other item style properties in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control will also have a red font.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性，所有其他項目中的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項也會有紅色字型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide a common appearance for the control by setting a single item style property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您設定單一項目的樣式屬性提供通用控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You can override the inherited style settings for an item style property that is higher in the hierarchy by setting its style properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫繼承的樣式設定為設定其樣式屬性階層中較高者為項目樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a blue font for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> property, overriding the red font specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定藍色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>屬性，覆寫中指定的紅色字型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the hierarchy order from highest to lowest.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出階層順序從最高到最低。

trans-unit.source: |Precedence|Style Property| |----------------|--------------------| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |2|SelectedItemStyle| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| To specify a custom style for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: |優先順序 |樣式屬性 | |----------------|--------------------| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>| |&2; |SelectedItemStyle | |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A>| |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>| 若要指定自訂樣式選取項目，加上`<SelectedItemStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.AlternatingItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<SelectedItemStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<SelectedItemStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>物件，其中包含在選取的項目之樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定選取的項目中的範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedItemTemplate property to control the contents of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 SelectedItemTemplate 屬性來控制所選項目的內容。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the selected item is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 選取之項目的外觀由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedItemStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the selected item, place the `<SelectedItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定選取的項目範本，將`<SelectedItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<SelectedItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<SelectedItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for the selected item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含選取的項目中的範本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field for the selected data list item.

trans-unit.source: The key field value for the selected data list item.
trans-unit.target: 選取的資料清單項目的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that no data list item is currently selected.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties of the separator between each item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得每個項目之間的分隔符號的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the SeparatorStyle property to provide a custom style for the separator between each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SeparatorStyle 屬性來提供每個項目之間的分隔符號的自訂樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The separator allows you to place an element with custom content between each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 分隔可讓您放入每個項目之間的自訂內容元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Common style attributes that can be adjusted include foreground color, background color, font, and content alignment within the cell.
trans-unit.target: 您可以調整的通用樣式屬性包括前景色彩、 背景色彩、 字型和與資料格內的內容對齊。

trans-unit.source: Providing a different style enhances the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供不同的樣式增強的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom style for the separator, place the `<SeparatorStyle>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂分隔符號的樣式，將`<SeparatorStyle>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the style attributes within the opening `<SeparatorStyle>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出樣式中的屬性開頭`<SeparatorStyle>`標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the style properties of the separator between each item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>物件，其中包含每個項目之間的分隔符號的樣式屬性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for the separator between the items of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定範本的項目之間的分隔符號<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the SeparatorTemplate property to control the contents of the separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SeparatorTemplate 屬性來控制內容的項目之間的分隔符號<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The separator allows you to place an element with custom content between each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 分隔可讓您放入每個項目之間的自訂內容元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 項目之間的分隔符號的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SeparatorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: To specify a template for the separator, place the `<SeparatorTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定做為分隔符號的範本，加上`<SeparatorTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<SeparatorTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<SeparatorTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> button is clicked for an item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref>按鈕中的項目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCommand event is raised when the `Update` button for an item is clicked.
trans-unit.target: UpdateCommand 引發時`Update`按鈕的按一下項目。

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the UpdateCommand event updates the data, sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control.
trans-unit.target: 一般處理常式，如 UpdateCommand 事件更新的資料，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>屬性`-1`（若要取消選取的項目），然後重新繫結至資料和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 這個控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)， [How to︰ 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateCommandName field to represent the `Update` command name.
trans-unit.target: 使用 UpdateCommandName 欄位來代表`Update`命令名稱。
